name: Brick Breaker Evolution - UL Game Jam Nov 2018
name_original: Brick Breaker Evolution - UL Game Jam Nov 2018
description:
Brick Breaker EVO 

How to Play!

Spacebar or Left click to fire ball

"A" and "D" to move the play left and right! :)

Follow @ajsgamedev on Twitter and Instgram for more games! :)
